attributes.action: Make Capital Punishment legal in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: We asked 100 young people if they would like to see Capital Punishment in the UK. 40% of people said yes, only 27% of people said no and 33% of people said maybe or don't know.
attributes.background: We would like the Government to introduce Capital Punishment to Britain as many other countries that do have Capital Punishment have a lower crime rate and a lower homicide rate.Britain has a high crime rate and we believe Capital Punishment  would decrease our crime rate and homicide rate.
